findings.title: Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: Manipulate Total Supply
findings.description: The total supply increased proportional to the time that has elapsed since the contract creation.

findings.title: Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, and make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.

findings.title: Contract Owner Can Blacklist Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has administrative powers that can be used maliciously to disturb users' transactions.
